title: Fishing Planet: Happy 4th of July Pack!
description: Fishing Planet created this special Happy 4th of July Pack that features all of the limited edition Independence Day goodies like the patriotic UncleSam™ Spinning Rod, star-spangled BornAmerican™ Fishing Jacket, historic AmericanEagle™ Casting Reel and much much more!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Happy 4th of July Pack!
<!--text-->
Hey anglers, Happy Independence Day!
In fact, this 4th of July is a great American holiday! But what are the first things about this day that come to mind aside from its historical significance? Probably fireworks, the national festivities and of course a wonderful opportunity to spend the day out fishing!
That’s why Fishing Planet created this special Happy 4th of July Pack that features all of the limited edition Independence Day goodies like the patriotic UncleSam™ Spinning Rod, star-spangled BornAmerican™ Fishing Jacket, historic AmericanEagle™ Casting Reel and much much more!
So don’t miss the chance to liberate your fishing spirits and give a festive patriotic air this annual celebration with our Independence Day 4th of July Pack!

Happy 4th of July Pack includes:
* 40 000 CREDITS - use the Credits to purchase new tackle, pay for fishing trips, repairs and any other in-game expenses.
* 20 BAITCOINS - use to purchase certain fishing tackle, available only for BaitCoins. Spend your BaitCoins wisely!
* 7-DAY PREMIUM - enjoy seven days of Premium Status and advance your game progress by getting a 50% boost to Experience and credits earned for every fish you catch! In addition, you get the opportunity to rent a kayak with a 50% discount! You also get the privilege of free registration in Competitions and the advantage of using free Forward Time function twice as often!
* 50 Storage Slots
* 2 Tackle Setups Slots

RODS‘N REELS - Independence Day combos for a liberating fishing vacation!
Rods:
* UncleSam™  6' 3" (190) - Length: 6' 3" (1.9 m); Lure Weight: 1/2–1 3/4 Oz. (15-45 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 6–21 Lb. (3.5-9.5 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 7
* LibertyCast™  8' 10" (270) - Length: 8' 10" (2.7 m); Lure Weight: 1/5–5/8 Oz. (6-18 g); Power: Med Light; Line Weight: 3.5–10.5 Lb (1.5-4.7 kg); Action: Moderate; Pieces: 2; Guides: 9
Reels:
* Patriot’sDream™ 4000 - Ratio: 5.0:1; Recovery: 35.5" (90 cm); Capacity: mono 20/100 (0.4/100), braid 30/135 (0.28/135); Max Drag: 19.8 Lb. (9 kg)
* AmericanEagle™ 2000 - Ratio: 7.4:1; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: mono 4/100 (0.2/100), braid 10/100 (0.2/100); Max Drag: 9.9 Lb. (4.5 kg)

TERMINAL TACKLE 
Lines: 
Mono .010" (0.25 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 8 Lb. (3.6 kg)
Mono .012" (0.3 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 12 Lb. (5.4 kg)
Mono .016" (0.4 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 20 Lb. (9 kg)
Fluoro .011" (0.28 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 10 Lb. (4.5 kg)
Fluoro .012" (0.3 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 12 Lb. (5.5 kg)
Fluoro .014" (0.35 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 15 Lb. (6.8 kg)
Fluoro .016" (0.4 mm) - Length: 1000 yd (1000 m); Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
Lures:
* Nano Spoon 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x3)
* Narrow Spoon 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x2)
* Medium Spoon 6/7 Oz. (24 g), #6/0 (x2)
* Barbless Nano Spoon 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x3)
* Barbless Narrow Spoon 1/4 Oz.  (7 g), #1/0 (x2)
* Barbless Medium Spoon 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #3/0 (x2)
* Nano Spinner 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x3)
* Spinner 1/2 Oz.  (14 g), #3/0 (x2)
* Spinner 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #6/0 (x2)
* Barbless Nano Spinner 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x3)
* Barbless Spinner 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #3/0 (x2)
* Crankbait 8 ft (2.5 m) #4/0, Crankbait 12 ft (3.5 m) #2/0, Crankbait 16 ft (5 m) #3/0, Crankbait 23 ft (7 m) #3/0, Crankbait 30 ft (9 m) #4/0, Crankbait 6 ft (2 m) #5/0

EQUIPMENT – some valuable items of the limited Independence Day collectible edition!
* BornAmerican™ Fishing Jacket - Tackles: 13; Lines: 2
* JulyForce™ Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 2
* FishFort M  - Max Single Fish Weight: 44 Lb. (20 kg); Total Fish Weight: 220 Lb. (100 kg); Fish-Friendly: yes
Fireworks:
* Fireshark Epic Rockets
* Hellfish Arsonist Kit
* Squid-pro-Quo Blaster Pack
* 12 Monkeys Demolition Set

FISHING LICENSES (7 DAYS):
* Advanced Oregon License
* Advanced Alberta License
* Advanced Michigan License
* Advanced Colorado License
